message:
The Defense Department repositioned warships, accelerating planning in case the president asks it to intervene, officials said.

‎"The United States began moving warships toward Libya & froze $30 billion in the country’s assets on Monday as the administration declared all options on the table in its diplomatic, economic & military campaign to drive Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi from power."

http://www.nytimes.com/2011/03/01/world/africa/01military.html?_r=1
